Location: Zoom (livestreamed on YouTube)

Agenda:
* Client updates on optimizations
* Specs update/clarification
  * Discuss how clients fail invalid blocks in a timely manner
    * Max item check ([specs](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/2109#issuecomment-3823978077), [EIP](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/11234))

  * JSON RPC update ([PR](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/726))
* Testing updates

Feel free to propose additional agenda items.
